law.text: Subsection (3) of KRS 36.080 shall not apply to armories constructed by or rented from the Commonwealth of Kentucky Military Department Armory Corporation, organized under the laws of Kentucky, July 10, 1939.
law.history: Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 103, sec. 3. -- Created 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 72, sec. 3.
